resources.string: These pre-set categories define your wines. Press to view your category, and their respective items.
Hint: Go to Analytics to view your progress on your category item collection!
Not sure how many items you already have? Go to All Categories > View Category
Reminder: To start accumulating your category collection amount, go to My Collections > Add Wines > and press the + button next to the desired category. Then enter your new category item.

This page resembles your progress regarding your total category item collection, along with the goal amount. The bar visually indicates your progress on how many items you currently have, and how many there are still left to add.
This chart resembles your percentage on completing your goal amount of category items. The remaining % indicates a remaining percentage of category items still to collect.
